md:
giải nghĩa từ "composition" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Composition (noun)
	* Definition: The act of creating something, such as a piece of music, a work of art, or a piece of writing.
	* Vietnamese translation: Sự sáng tạo
	* Example sentence: "The composer's latest composition was a beautiful symphony."
	* Related words: create, write, art, music, piece

2. Composition (noun)
	* Definition: The way in which something is made up or organized.
	* Vietnamese translation: Cấu trúc
	* Example sentence: "The composition of the team was a mix of experienced players and young talent."
	* Related words: structure, organization, makeup, arrangement

3. Composition (noun)
	* Definition: A mixture of different things, such as chemicals or substances.
	* Vietnamese translation: Hỗn hợp
	* Example sentence: "The composition of the medicine was a combination of several active ingredients."
	* Related words: mixture, blend, compound, formula

4. Composition (photography) (noun)
	* Definition: The arrangement of visual elements in a photograph or other image.
	* Vietnamese translation: Cấu trúc hình ảnh
	* Example sentence: "The photographer carefully considered the composition of the shot to create a sense of balance."
	* Related words: layout, arrangement, framing, visual

Note: The meanings of "composition" can vary depending on the context in which it is used. The above definitions and translations are some of the most common uses of the word.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "composition" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Composition (noun)

    • Definition: The act of creating something, such as a piece of music, a work of art, or a piece of writing.
    • Vietnamese translation: Sự sáng tạo
    • Example sentence: "The composer's latest composition was a beautiful symphony."
    • Related words: create, write, art, music, piece

  2. Composition (noun)

    • Definition: The way in which something is made up or organized.
    • Vietnamese translation: Cấu trúc
    • Example sentence: "The composition of the team was a mix of experienced players and young talent."
    • Related words: structure, organization, makeup, arrangement

  3. Composition (noun)

    • Definition: A mixture of different things, such as chemicals or substances.
    • Vietnamese translation: Hỗn hợp
    • Example sentence: "The composition of the medicine was a combination of several active ingredients."
    • Related words: mixture, blend, compound, formula

  4. Composition (photography) (noun)

    • Definition: The arrangement of visual elements in a photograph or other image.
    • Vietnamese translation: Cấu trúc hình ảnh
    • Example sentence: "The photographer carefully considered the composition of the shot to create a sense of balance."
    • Related words: layout, arrangement, framing, visual

Note: The meanings of "composition" can vary depending on the context in which it is used. The above definitions and translations are some of the most common uses of the word.
